title: Looking for new champ to main
body:
I main Annie. I find I trade really well and zone really well. Focusing on last hitting to me is quite boring so I like that I can reliably Q my minions. Is there any other champion that can spam an ability and easily secure minion kills? (Not Karthus pls).

I'm considering Nasus but there is a relatively high mana cost and CD associated with it.

replies.body: I like the Ori and Veigar ideas.

easily spam abilities and farm? {{champion:157}} ?
You literally don't need timing at all.
hey buddie I AM one of those guys. -_-
Orianna can farm pretty easily. So can Twisted Fate.
